definitions.text: an unvarying or habitual method or procedure
a short theatrical performance that is part of a longer program
examples: he did his act three times every evening
she had a catchy little routine
it was one of the best numbers he ever did

definitions.text: a set sequence of steps, part of larger computer program
found in the ordinary course of events; ; ; - Anita Diamant
examples: there's nothing quite like a real...train conductor to add color to a quotidian commute
